Text:

Yup rar files are not worth the bandwith or HDD space.  What a waste of a torrent
All u have to do is just extract all the files using winrar and they will all extract to a new folder. In the new folder is one avi video with the whole episode.
Oh yeah forgot to say thnxs for the upload. I guess ur the only one who uploaded it too.

waste of a torrent? Familiarize yourself with rar files and quit winging. Above all, thank the person that posted it!

People should be less greedy, come on, it's for free!
But im still waiting patiently for the 720p release :D

As to my original comment, rar file are a mere inconvenience. I was asking why split it up that way to begin with? Years ago when DL'ing from IRC chat it made sense to do this, as you could connect to multiple files at once and get it quicker. But in todays world of broadband and torrents I o not see the purpose.
